title: Advanced ROM Management
no_duplicates: ‚ÑπÔ∏è No duplicates found in selected folder
scan_complete: ‚úÖ Scan completed! Found {} duplicate groups ({} total files)
no_rom_files: ‚ÑπÔ∏è No valid ROM files found in folder
roms_found_total: üìä Found {} ROM files in {} total folders
no_roms_found: ‚ùå No ROM files found in selected folder
scanning_folders: üîç Recursive scanning of folders and subfolders...
multi_disk_separate: Each disc is treated as separate game. Manually verify if needed.
cleaned_summary: ‚ú® CLEANED will contain: {} singles + {} best = {} ROMs total
legend_subtitle: Complete guide to ROM file tags
legend_info_text: üí° Use this information to configure priorities in Advanced mode
qual_verified_desc: Verified Good Dump: Verified and perfectly playable version, a must-have
qual_pending_desc: Pending Dump: This is the closest copy of the original game to date, but still waiting for a true copy of the ROM
qual_alt_desc: Alternative: Alternative version, usually they fix bugs
qual_bad_desc: Bad Dump: The dump was not done correctly, it's a corrupted version
qual_fixed_desc: Fixed: Optimized to work better on the emulator
qual_hacked_desc: Hacked: Modified version, can be anything from a cheat mod, new game to a wacky hack
qual_overdump_desc: Overdump: size larger than a standard cartridge, does not change anything in the emulator
qual_formed_desc: Formed: Usually opens a cheat menu when launching the rom
qual_newer_trans_desc: Newer translation: Rom translation, use current rom
qual_older_trans_desc: Older translation: Translation has outgrown the rom, new one exists
qual_unlicensed_desc: Unlicensed: Quite rare, this is a finished or unfinished game that has never been edited
qual_bootleg_desc: This is a 'pirate' version of the game. Sometimes modified versions with gameplay changes
qual_trial_desc: Trial version, playable version, limited version demo
qual_midway_desc: Games re-released after Midway bought the rights
adv_multilingual_menu_desc: Multilingual; # of languages (selectable by a menu)
adv_pirate_cart_info_desc: Information about the pirated internal cartridge
adv_pirate_variant_desc: Information about the pirated internal cartridge; # th variant
adv_hack_intro_desc: Intro of the hacked dumping group
adv_hack_intro_removed_desc: Intro of hacked dumping group deleted
adv_bios_desc: Copy of basic console input/output system
tech_compilation_desc: ROM is a dump of a compilation
spec_bs_desc: Broadcast Satellite (SNES) - ROMs sent by satellite
spec_st_desc: Sufami Turbo (SNES) - Special cartridge for GB games
spec_pc10_desc: PlayChoice 10 (NES) - Arcade version based on NES games
spec_vs_desc: Versus (NES) - Same as PC10 but not playable solo
spec_jcart_desc: The original cartridge has two controller ports (Genesis)
spec_bugfix_desc: Bug Fix - For modified physical cartridge (Game Boy)
spec_ique_desc: Chinese Game Boy Advance ROM for IQue console
